short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access our website easily without having to search for anything!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Updated for version 2.3

Access our website easily with this extension! No need to surf through many pages or use the search bar to find a page on our website! With frequent updates and great customer support, we guarantee you will have a great experience with this extension.

View our FULL Changelog: https://mc-creativebuilding.net/services/chrome-extension/changelog 


If you ever have any issues, please contact us: https://mc-creativebuilding.net/services/chrome-extension/support



Update Log: 
2.3 -- Update Information   << -- Current Version (This update took longer than expected, sorry for the inconvenience.)
	• Built-in Contact Us page (With Ticket ID generator) - Get extension-related support faster.
	• Added a help center/article center - Find articles on common issues and questions with answers without the need to contact us. (If an issue is related specifically to you, we recommend you contact us instead, as we may be able to provide better answers.)
	• Fixed notifications
	• Formatting issues fixed
	• Improved App Performance
	• Redeveloped the platform (HTML, CSS, JS with the addition of C#) - (C# is not included in the Chrome extension build itself, it is hosted on data.mc-creativebuilding.net. C# is used to provide dynamic content & display unity apps - Parts of the Chrome extension will require internet access, while others don't.)
	• Added a built-in chat app to the applications menu
	• Added New URLs
	• Added New Categories: Editing/Software
	• Improved Security
	• Survey link moved to the bottom of the extension (Footer) so the extension looks nicer.
	• Bug fixes (The main page would not load correctly causing the URLs to disappear.)

2.2 -- Update Information:
	• Cleaned up source (Added folders to house files instead of them being in 1 place)
	• Updated internals (jQuery, FontAwesome & Bootstrap) to their latest versions.
	• Added a video player (Useful for the future)
	• Added files for accounts (Useful for the future)
	• We tried to remove unnecessary files & code not being used to reduce storage consumption (About 5-6mb [Package])
	• Enhanced search feature
	• Compressed files for faster loading
	• New URLs
	• New Categories (Built-In Apps)
	• Introducing Web App! (Our main website inside the chrome extension)
	• Gaming Center (Powered by CreativeBuilding | Network Gaming Center, you can now find & play games on the extension)
	• Bug Fixes (Errors with CSS not showing up on pages)


2.1 -- Update Information:
	• Survey In App
	• Added a EULA
	• New URLs and categories (Storage Services & Productivity)
	• Updated search tool
	• New update feature (Will alert users when a new update is available)
	• Updates to the options page
	• Work in progress on redirection system
	• UI & UX Fixes & updates
	• Updated internal features
	• Updated background.js & other service workers
	• Terms/Privacy Policy Updates
	• Added a current version feature in the footer of the main popup.
	• Bug Fixes

1.6  Update Information:
	•  Added new URLs 
	• Bug Fixes


1.5 -- Update Information:
	• Added new icons
	• New URLs
	• Bug Fixes
	• Updated Bootstrap: from v3.4.1 -> 5.2.3 (CSS and JS)
	• Added JQuery to the scripts.js file. Version: 3.6.2
	• Updated FontAwesome. Version 6.2.1
	• Added a donations page
	• You can reload the extension. This feature can be used if an update hasn't 
          rolled out yet, or there is a bug causing the extension to be unusable. (Button 
          is at the bottom)

1.4 -- Update Information:
	• New Categories: Services
	• New URLs to visit
	• Minor updates to options 
	• Redirection system is now being worked on
	• New share page (Share our main website on your social media accounts, and 
          emails)
	• New Changelog page (After 5 major releases, previous versions of this 
          extension on the 
          chrome web store update log will be removed to save space.) --> https://mc-creativebuilding.net/services/chrome-extension/changelog 
	• Added Font Awesome
	• Bug Fixes

1.3 -- Update Information:
	• New Categories: Entertainment
	• New URLs to visit
	• Changes to the options page
	• New redirection system (This feature will be rolled out in the next couple 
          releases)
	• New form of contact (Choose between extension support and other related 
          support including the website, discord & Minecraft server)

1.2 -- Update Information:
	• Full-screen option on the settings page
	• New URLs to visit
	• New categories: Engagement, Social Media, 
          Appeals/Applications
	• Bug Fixes
